code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getSectorVolatility}from'../../services/aiService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SectorAnalysis=()=>{const[sectors,setSectors]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchSectors=async()=>{try{const data=await getSectorVolatility();setSectors(data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to load sectors:',error);setLoading(false);}};fetchSectors();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4 text-center",children:"Loading sectors..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-xl shadow p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-4",children:"Sector Volatility Analysis"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:sectors.map((sector,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`p-4 rounded-lg border ${sector.change>3?'bg-red-50 border-red-200':sector.change<-2?'bg-blue-50 border-blue-200':'bg-gray-50'}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"font-bold",children:sector.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:`font-medium ${sector.change>0?'text-green-600':'text-red-600'}`,children:[sector.change>0?'+':'',sector.change,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:"Top Stocks:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-1 mt-1",children:sector.topStocks.map((stock,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"px-2 py-1 bg-gray-100 rounded text-xs",children:stock},i))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mt-3 text-blue-600 text-sm font-medium",children:"View AI Recommendations"})]},index))})]});};export default SectorAnalysis;
